cast.overview: After his life is turned upside down when his wife is killed in a London terrorist attack, a brilliant but introverted CIA decoder takes matters into his own hands when his supervisors refuse to take action.
cast.title: The Amateur

details.biography:
Philippe’s Television roles include ‘Admiral Chabot’ in THE TUDORS, ‘Davis Belkman’ in COMME DES CHAMPIONS, ‘Maitre D’ in HUSTLE and ‘Pierre’ in FOOTBALLERS WIVES. He also played ‘Patrick Bertrand’ in SPOOKS and ‘Frenchy’ in KEEN EDDIE.

His Stage roles include ‘Lance Fredricksen’ in LOIN DE CORPUS CHRISTI at the Festival NAVA, ‘Pierre Lapin’ in PLAYING AWAY  at Sadler’s Wells, ‘Octavius’ in JULIUS CAESAR at Théâtre Antique de Fourvières in Lyon, France and ‘Fernand Worms’ in LE MOUVEAU TESTAMENT by Sasha Guitry at the Théâtre Mouffetard in Paris and on tour.
details.name: Philippe De Grossouvre
